channel.title: Api on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Api on Hashnopolis

item.title: Read N Characters Given Read4
item.description: The API: int read4(char *buf) reads 4 characters at a time from a file. The return value is the actual number of characters read. For example, it returns 3 if there is only 3 characters left in the file. By using the read4 API, implement the function int read(char *buf, int n)that reads n characters from the file. Example 1 Input: buf = "abc", n = 4 Output: "abc" Explanation: The actual number of characters read is 3, which is "abc".
